review: love this series great game just wish ea would make more command and conquer games or even remaster more of the old games like they did with remaster edition highly recommended
this series is one of the first pc games that i had enjoy the early years of my life being able to relive the moment and able to get back to rts games feels like a relived memory to me

completed ra1 multiple times on all difficulties as a kid over 15 years of ra2 experience with 23 hours a day before steam existed is this as good as ra2 no it really is not but a truly great game jumping into this 15 years after it came out still hold up well a very good nostalgic game for the 90s generation
all star cast and three different factions to choose from
this is the last rts game i played and had fun with also it got a surprisingly large fan base and mod community in chinacheck out the corona mod
fuck you and youre ea play subscribsion just  let me fing buy and download the game
right i remember now why i never finished this back when i had origin  goddamn co commanders are way too annoying

i would rate this 7510 it is a fine rts with good production value and unit variety in the 2020s it is pretty dated but i suppose it is one of the last cc games so it is your best bet if you want to jump back into the pretty much dead franchise
i think they shut down the servers

its cc but lacks the originality some units are overly complicated unable to zoom out enough too many interruptions to the gameplay  this is where they clearly started to lose what made the series so popular

the best strategy game ive ever played in my life

gameplay 10 visuals 10 sound 10 story 9  experience 10  verdict kirov reporting

this one was a childhood favorite of mine i grew up with rts games and this one was one of my favorites flavorwise the game is incredibly heavy on micromanagement since every unit has a toggleable or triggered ability so be ready for that i found myself getting overwhelmed a lot but still a ton of fun  the single player campaign is incredibly fun which is rare in my opinion for rts games of its time
love this game and definitely love having a bear attack people

one of the best strategic games i have played love the whole cc franchise this game is insane fun and my personal favourite faction the allied fraction  this game is packed with scifi action and a mix with coldwar action movies great cast and funny  cgi movies that all add to realism 55
massively underrated game definitely deserved a sequel
absolute peak shame they didnt make more games after red alert 3

the cutscenes are hilarious the gameplay is okay the mission design during the campaign ranges from basic to bad the focus on coop was an interesting choice but the execution ultimately a nuisance its not all bad but its not a good game either
its one of the best srl game with interesting and funny plot good mechanics and unforgettable experience
its good that they enabled the workshop
although it feels like the game feels like its trying to be more mainstream compared to red alert 2 i still had fun none the less
too cartoony and zoomed in for me

not the best game in the series but still has the enjoyable cc feel  the most annoying aspect is that the single player campaign is designed around having a coop commander the ai can fill the role but in some levels they can be overwhelmed and defeated leaving you on your own
been playing this game for years enjoyed every minute of it and would recommend it to anyone
this game s soo good but please add new units

best out of the entrie series one of if not the best rts i have ever played still has an active multyplayer community which makes it even better i wish i could forget all those memories with that game and start fresh
is game is good so good i love it
i enjoyed coop a lot its a great game with saturated graphics and clear units underrated gem in red alert series
it good but it need a mod on warhammer40k

great gameplay with a timeless soundtrack and great visuals especially considering this game is almost 20 years old now comes with 3 asymmetric factions 3 seperate campaigns which are all full coop supported and a fleshed out skirmishmultiplayer mode you need a community launcher for the mp now tho  easy recommend if you like basebuilding alternatehistory or just classic high quality rts gameplay
would you recommend this game to other players absolutely yes most definitely
